item.title: Soft and Fluffy Zero Carb Yogurt Bread for Keto Diets
item.description: Discover the delight of soft and fluffy Zero Carb Yogurt Bread, a perfect guilt-free option for keto diets. Easy to make and delicious, try it today!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 10 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 cups plain Greek yogurt
  • 2 cups almond flour
  • 1 tablespoon baking powder
  • 1 teaspoon salt
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon onion powder
  • 2 large eggs

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a large bowl, mix the Greek yogurt, almond flour, baking powder, salt, garlic powder, and onion powder until well combined.
  3. Add the eggs and mix until smooth.
  4. Pour the batter into a greased loaf pan.
  5. Bake for 30 minutes or until golden brown and a toothpick comes out clean.
  6. Let cool before slicing.
